resources.string: CrimeSeen Quiz
According to the CRIMESEEN crime detection algorithms West Humber-Claireville has the highest crime rating.
The police service headquarters are located on Yonge Street.
According to Maclean\'s, Toronto is the 124th most crime ridden city in Canada.
The number of homicides have increased from 2017 to 2018.
Toronto\'s crime severity index is higher than the national average.
There is an Ontario wide curfew for people under the age of 16.
Yorkdale-Glen Park has the least amount of stolen cars in the Toronto Metropolitan Area.
true
